description:
Removes common status effects like Poison, Blind, Rage,
etc.
name: Dispel Herb

description:
Can only be used by Mechanic - Guarentees Crit for the
next 2 turns.
name: Gear1-Smith Sharpen
note:
<setup action>

clear battle log

display action
wait: 20
hide battle hud

camera focus: user
zoom: 150%, 20
camera offset: right, 50

animation 121: user
wait for animation

immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>

motion skill: user
animation 52: target
wait for animation

action effect

wait for movement
wait: 5
show battle hud

</target action>

description:

Man, it's not even a rare...

description:
Look guys! I have a rare PNG on my phone,
aren't I cool? It even recovers 50MP!
name: Rare PNG

just a 4 star...oh well at least it heals 100HP
